CUST_AMMO: [Level] Customize= CUST_AMMO, {Ammo slot}, {Ammo flags (AMMO_...)}, {Damage}, {Shots in box}, {Shots with weapon}, {Extra}, {ID of TriggerGroup when hit enemy}, {Damage for explosion}, {Speed}, {Gravity}, {ID of AddEffect to ammo}, {ID of TriggerGroup at end}
CUST_BAR: [Level] Customize= CUST_BAR, {Bar type (BAR_...)}, {Flags (FBAR_...)}, {X origin}, {Y origin}, {X size}, {Y size}, {Color1 ID}, {Color2 ID}, {Extra}
CUST_BINOCULARS: [Level] Customize= CUST_BINOCULARS, {Flags (BINF_...)}, {Parameter}, {Compass image}, {Compass rect and flags}, {Sextant image}, {Sextant rect and flags}, {Lightness rect and flags}, {Zoom rect and flags}, {LightSwitch rect and flags}, {Font ID}
CUST_CAMERA: [Level] Customize= CUST_CAMERA, {Flags (FCAM_...)}, {Distance from ChaseCam}, {V orient of ChaseCam}, {H orient of ChaseCam}, {Distance from CombatCam}, {V orient of CombatCam}, {Distance from LookCam}, {Height of LookCam}, {Camera speed}
CUST_DARTS: [Level] Customize= CUST_DARTS, {CustDarts ID}, {Dart flags (DRT_...)}, {AddEffect ID}, {Speed}, {Emitting timer}, {Primary color RGB ID}, {Secondary color RGB ID}, {TriggerGroup ID}
CUST_DISABLE_MISSING_SOUNDS: ; Syntax for this command was not specified by its creator
CUST_FLARE: [Level] Customize= CUST_FLARE, {Flags for flare (FFL_...)}, {Life time in seconds}, {Red}, {Green}, {Blue}, {Intensity}
CUST_HARPOON: [Level] Customize= CUST_HARPOON, {Harpoon flags (HRP_...)}, {Top border}, {Distance from cam}, {X orient}, {Y orient}, {Z orient}, {Harpoon speed}, {Harpoon gravity}
CUST_LIGHT_OBJECT: [Level] Customize= CUST_LIGHT_OBJECT 34, {Light slot}, {Red}, {Green}, {Blue}, {Intensity}, {Time} ; Not sure what the author meant with that 34... Probably useless?
CUST_NEW_SOUND_ENGINE: [Level] Customize= CUST_NEW_SOUND_ENGINE, {New sound engine flags (NSE_...)}, {Sound extension (SEXT_...)}, {Long fade-out}, {Short fade-out}
CUST_PARALLEL_BARS: [Level] Customize= CUST_PARALLEL_BARS, {Parallel bar flags (PB_...)}, {Speed for slide}, {Max turns}
CUST_RAIN: [Level] Customize= CUST_RAIN, {Rain flags (FR_...)}, {Drop size}, {Sprinkler amount}, {Max rain}, {Min rain}, {Float1}, {Float4}, {Float8}, {Float16}, {Extra}
CUST_ROLLINGBALL_PUSHING: [Level] Customize= CUST_ROLLINGBALL_PUSHING, {Distance}, {Push animation}, {Failed animation}, {Movement frame}, {Activation frame}, {Invulnerability frame}, {Speed}
CUST_ROLLING_BOAT: [Level] Customize= CUST_ROLLING_BOAT, {Boat slot}, {Rolling boat flags (FRB_...)}, {Swinging speed}, {Pitching speed}, {Rolling SFX}
CUST_SCREENSHOT_CAPTURE: [Level] Customize= CUST_SCREENSHOT_CAPTURE, {Duration in seconds}, {Frame gap}, {Quality of screenshot flags (QSF_...)}
CUST_SHATTER_RANGE: [Level] Customize= CUST_SHATTER_RANGE, {First static as shatter}, {Last static as shatter}
CUST_SHOW_AMMO_COUNTER: [Level] Customize= CUST_SHOW_AMMO_COUNTER, {Color}, {Format flags (FT_...)}, {Blink time}, {Character size (SC_...)}, {Show counter flags (SHOWC_...)}
CUST_WEAPON: [Level] Customize= CUST_WEAPON, {Weapon slot}, {Weapon flags (WEAP_...)}, {Shot sound}, {Recharge frame}, {Flash duration}, {Extra}, {Max distance for aiming}, {TakeWeapon frame}, {LetWeapon frame}, {Random}, {V position of weapon}, {Unknown}, {Counter frame}, {MinRange frame}, {MaxRange frame}, {X origin}, {Y origin}, {Z origin}, {Origin orient}
